title: PBE Sign Up Page blown up by Ziggs
body: I'm trying to sign up for the PBE and nothing on the sign up page works for me. The error message "Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later" I've tried loading the site on a few devices and its the same on every one.

replies.body: What link are you using to access the page?  If you're using a link for another reason, you can end up getting the one for Ziggs.  If you're on NA, make sure to login to the correct account using the [NA Link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  I hope that helps!
I'm now getting the blitzcrank error:500
The 500 error is an issue we've been looking into.  In the meantime, some players were able to get around it by using a VPN.  Let me know if that works for you.
